title: Three bed room apartment for sale
details:
Three bed room spacious apartment for sale at Nugegoda town,
Large living and dinning area
Three bed rooms with two attached bath rooms and one common bath room
Modern fitted pantry
Study room

This apartment is situated in working distance to the Nugegoda Super Market and other important places in Nugegoda town.
Nine floored apartment complex
This apartment is the biggest apartment in the complex
And this apartment has its Swimming pool, Kiddies Pool and Gymnasium and other all amenities which is necessary to the modern world. Obtain National Award 2009 for this apartment complex.
Total Floors 9 Build (Year) 2009
24 hour security
Back-up Generator
Lift
Parking facility
Roof terrace
